name: create_booking
description: Create a gaming station booking at Cuephoria. Requires customer name, phone, station ID, date, and time slot.

request_body_schema.description: Request body for creating a gaming station booking

properties.name: customer_name
properties.description: Full name of the customer making the booking

properties.name: customer_phone
properties.description: Customer phone number (10 digits, can include country code or formatting)

properties.name: station_id
properties.description: Station ID to book. For multiple stations, make separate requests or pass comma-separated IDs

properties.name: start_time
properties.description: Start time in HH:MM format (24-hour, e.g., 14:00 for 2:00 PM)

properties.name: end_time
properties.description: End time in HH:MM format (24-hour, e.g., 15:00 for 3:00 PM)

properties.name: duration
properties.description: Duration in minutes (optional, defaults to 60 minutes)
